user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to Hawaii and need some information about popular beaches and water activities. Can you suggest some beautiful beaches in Maui and Oahu? Additionally, I would like to find images of these beaches to get a better idea of the scenery and water conditions. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of popular beaches in Maui.
Research and compile a list of popular beaches in Oahu.
Request images of the beaches identified in Maui.
Request images of the beaches identified in Oahu.
